title: Charming Lisbon Heritage Hideaway on Avenida da Liberdade with Rooftop Terrace & Daily Breakfast
description:
Established in 1954, this family-owned boutique hotel is renowned for its warm service and rich history. Combining classic Portuguese decor with contemporary comforts, this stay exudes a charming atmosphere in a central location, nestled just off Avenida da Liberdade. Savour a glass of local port wine on the rooftop terraceand absorb the sights and sounds of one of the world's oldest cities, dotted with landmarks like São Jorge Castle and the Tagus River.

Among the city's yellow trams and sweeping hills, Hotel Lisboa Plaza offers quick access to major attractions, such as Av. da Liberdade for fine dining and boutique shopping, Rossio Square for upscale cafes where you can sample a delectable pastel de nata, and the Alfama district for private Fado showings, a traditional genre of music characterised by soulful melodies.
offer_address: Travessa do Salitre 7, 1269-066 Lisbon, Portugal

vendor_name: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Contemporary Lisbon Escape with Two-Course Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description:
Revel in the elegance of this beautifully restored 19th-century building nestled beside the port in Portugal's capital. Combining old-world charm with eye-catching aesthetics, this urban haven claims an enviable spot in Lisbon, mere moments from the National Museum of Ancient Art, Rossio Square and the Alfama district.

Wind your way along the city's narrow cobbled alleys, hop onboard the iconic tram and sip wine at a local tasca. Then, retreat to your chic enclave, featuring glistening emerald stylings, original antiques, an intimate cocktail bar, a full-day dining restaurant and stylish guest rooms, all boasting breathtaking views over the city's terracotta rooftops.
location_description: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 130 Rua das Janelas Verdes, Lisbon 1200-690, Portugal

vendor_name: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Contemporary Lisbon Harbourfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Two-Course Dinner
description:
Revel in the elegance of this beautifully restored 19th-century building nestled beside the port in Portugal's capital. Combining old-world charm with eye-catching aesthetics, this urban haven claims an enviable spot in Lisbon, mere moments from the National Museum of Ancient Art, Rossio Square and the Alfama district.

Wind your way along the city's narrow cobbled alleys, hop onboard the iconic tram and sip wine at a local tasca. Then, retreat to your chic enclave, featuring glistening emerald stylings, original antiques, an intimate cocktail bar, a full-day dining restaurant and stylish guest rooms, all boasting breathtaking views over the city's terracotta rooftops.
location_description: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 130 Rua das Janelas Verdes, Lisbon 1200-690, Portugal

title: Romantic Boutique Lisbon Escape on Banks of Tagus River with Daily Breakfast
description:
Immerse yourself in the timeless charm of Portugal with a stay at this traditional boutique retreat, sitting just metres from the banks of the Tagus River. The 18th-century edifice dials up the romance, with a library overlooking the river and an enchanting garden where you can enjoy a leisurely breakfast surrounded by age-old climbing plants and a charming spiral staircase.

Relax in sunlit rooms adorned in soft coral tones before embracing all that the vibrant city has to offer. Explore the National Ancient Art Museum that's just next door, or hop on the traditional Tram 28 to visit the Basílica da Estrela or Alfama, the oldest - and most colourful - district of the city. With countless restaurants, cafes and bars on your doorstep, plus plenty to ignite the senses within walking distance, this hotel couldn't be better located for a Lisbon city break.
offer_address: Rua das Janelas Verdes, 47, 1200-690 Lisbon, Portugal

title: Charming Central Lisbon Escape with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Bar
description:
Uncover the heart and soul of Lisbon from the comfort of this sophisticated hotel housed in a beautifully restored historic building, just steps from Marquis of Pombal Square and Eduardo VII Park. From here, you’re perfectly placed to wander through Alfama’s cobbled alleys or hop on a classic yellow tram to the hilltop São Jorge Castle.

Begin your morning with a Mediterranean-inspired breakfast at Azul e Branco. Later, unwind at the Equestre Bar with a glass of wine or a good book, or catch the golden hour on the Limão Rooftop Bar - an open-air terrace boasting panoramic views over Lisbon’s terracotta rooftops.

Whether you're drawn by Lisbon’s old-world charm, exciting culinary scene or scenic viewpoints, H10 Duque de Loulé offers a refined yet relaxed base from which to explore it all in style.
offer_address: Av. Duque de Loulé, 81-83 - Av. Liberdade 1050-088 Lisbon, Portugal

title: Five-Star Boutique Lisbon Retreat with Avenida de Liberdade Views & Daily Breakfast
description:
The hills are alive with serene miradouros offering breathtaking views at the five-star Hotel Fontecruz Lisboa, a boutique escape overlooking the legendary Avenida de Liberdade, one of Europe’s most prestigious designer retail boulevards. Flawless Portuguese hospitality combines with effortless Parisian flair to provide sophisticated opulence backed by famous hillside views - each of the hotel’s 72 masterful rooms offers dazzling glimpses of storied cobblestone and the city's pastel walls, while the terrace boasts wine, handcrafted cocktails and sunset views to make the heart sing. Savour à la carte dining at Bistrôa restaurant, celebrating Portugal’s magnificent gastronomy, or wander the Avenida de Liberdade’s terraces and shop your way across some of the continent’s most exclusive boutiques.

When you’re ready to explore further, you’ll find yourself perfectly placed in the heart of the city. Saint Jorge Castle’s mighty palisades are a breezy 25-minute stroll away, and the city’s whirlwind melange of espresso shops, wine bars, theatres and Michelin-starred steakhouses are all within easy reach.
offer_address: 138-142 Avenida da Liberdade, Lisboa 1250-001 Portugal

title: Five-Star Heritage Palace Escape in the Heart of Lisbon with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Experience the history and magic of a beautifully restored 16th-century palace at The One Palácio de Anunciada, one of Lisbon’s finest five-star hotels ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Nestled in a narrow, cobblestoned street, a stone's throw from the city’s main thoroughfare, Avenida de Liberdade, this luxury lodging is perfectly positioned for exploring the best of the city’s laneways and lookouts. Wander down the Avenida to find Praça dos Restauradores Square, before stopping at one of the many café or bars in the district for a traditional pastel de nata custard tart.

Back at the hotel, explore the French-style gardens, central fountain, and century-old dragon tree in the inner courtyard, or admire the full grounds from your panoramic position in the rooftop swimming pool. Settle in for an afternoon of relaxation at Despacio Spa at The One, where you’ll find a Finnish sauna, plunge pool, and treatments that range from essential oil massages to diamond facials. After a day of exploring Lisbon, engage all your senses at Condes de Ericeira Restaurant, or sample the curated collection of cocktails at O Jardim Wine Bar.
offer_address: Rua das Portas de Santo Antão, 112-134, 1150-268 Av. Liberdade / Restauradores Lisbon

vendor_name: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton

Experience old-world charm in this elegant hotel set within a beautifully restored 19th-century building, claiming an enviable spot in Lisbon's art district, just moments from the National Museum of Ancient Art, Rossio Square and the historic Alfama district. description:
Established in 1954, this family-owned hotel, nestled just off Avenida da Liberdade, effortlessly combines Portuguese decor and contemporary comforts. Savour a glass of local port wine on the rooftop terrace as you take in one of the world's oldest cities, dotted with landmarks like Sao Jorge Castle and the Tagus River.

Among the city's historic tram lines and sweeping hills, Hotel Lisboa Plaza offers quick access to attractions such as Avenida da Liberdade's prestigious fine dining and boutique shopping, Rossio Square's upscale cafes where you can sample delectable pastel de nata and the Alfama district's traditional fado dinner shows, accompanied by characteristic soulful melodies.

vendor_name: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Central Lisbon 19th-Century Vintage Glamour with Daily Breakfast
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of Portugal's capital with a stay at The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton. Housed within a beautifully restored 19th-century building, this property claims an enviable spot in Lisbon's art district, just a stone's throw away from the National Museum of Ancient Art, Rossio Square and the historic Alfama district. Spend your days exploring the city's cobbled streets, indulging in delectable pastries, or sipping wine at a local tasca. Then, retreat to your elegant hotel, which features vibrant emerald stylings, original antiques, a charming cocktail bar, gastronomic restaurant and modern guest rooms, along with breathtaking views of the city's terracotta rooftops.

title: Charming Lisbon Boutique Retreat near Belem Tower with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks
description:
Tucked away in Lisbon's historic heart between the Ajuda and Belém neighbourhoods, recently opened Wine & Books Lisboa is the boutique European hideaway you've been dreaming of. Whether you're sipping vinho on the terrace, unwinding in the indulgent Turkish bath or dining like a local at Tasca da Memória, this contemporary gem wraps you in irresistible Portuguese magic.

Bask in the golden sunshine flooding through cosy public spaces and designer rooms, treating you to knockout views of Lisbon's terracotta rooftops. When it's time to explore, sample Portugal's famous sweet treats at the renowned Pastéis de Belém, and visit the iconic Belém Tower, just a short drive away, before returning to a glass of Port wine at the wine bar.
offer_address: Travessa da Memória 62, Lisbon 1300-403, Portugal

title: Lisbon Heritage Art Deco Escape with Daily Breakfast & Museum Entry
description:
Find yourself captivated by the magic of Portugal with a stay perfectly positioned for exploring the historic centre of Lisbon. Proudly retaining the glamour of the 1940s courtesy of a spectacular design by Cassiano Branco - a famous Portuguese modernist architect - Britania Art Deco Boutique Hotel, a Lisbon Heritage Collection transports you back in time.

Walk to the Time Out Market where you can savour oysters and Portuguese tarts, hop aboard the famous Tram 28 line nearby and take in panoramic views of Lisbon at Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.
location_description: Britania Art Deco Boutique Hotel, a Lisbon Heritage Collection
offer_address: Rua Rodrigues Sampaio 17, Lisbon 1150-278, Portugal

vendor_name: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Central Lisbon 19th-Century Vintage Glamour with Onsite Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of Portugal's capital with a stay at The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton. Housed within a beautifully restored 19th-century building, this property claims an enviable spot in Lisbon's art district just a stone's throw away from the National Museum of Ancient Art, Rossio Square and the historic Alfama district. Spend your days exploring the city's cobbled streets, indulging in delectable pastries, or sipping wine at a local tasca. Then, retreat to your elegant hotel featuring vibrant emerald stylings, original antiques, a charming cocktail bar, gastronomic restaurant and modern guest rooms, with breathtaking views of the city's terracotta rooftops.
location_description: The Emerald House Lisbon, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 130 Rua das Janelas Verdes, Lisbon 1200-690, Portugal

title: Boutique Stay in Glamorous Lisbon
description: Let the postcard-perfect panorama of Lisbon be the backdrop of your unforgettable stay in one of the most exclusive hotels in the city: H10 Duque de Loulé. Discover the magic of Lisbon from a privileged position in the heart of it all, and enjoy lavish daily breakfast, a refreshing welcome drink, a delicious Portuguese custard tart waiting in your room, and 30% discount on the decadent a la carte menu at Azul & Branco, the stylish hotel’s restaurant.
offer_address: Av. Duque de Loulé 81-83, 1050-088 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Five-Star Lisbon Luxury with High-End Day Spa
description:
Discover the rolling hills and iconic yellow trams of Lisbon, Portugal from the five-star Corinthia Lisbon - a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 winner boasting spectacular views over the city. The hotel epitomises style and luxury: public spaces are flooded with natural light, surfaces are laid with fresh flowers and chandeliers glitter. The onsite restaurant Erva serves up some of the city’s best local food. Meanwhile, Soul Garden is the go-to evening spot where you can chill out on a wooden cabana with a handcrafted cocktail in hand, listening to live music or DJ sets. When you need to soothe mind, body and soul, THE SPA with its heated jacuzzi, sauna and steam room awaits to pamper you.

You’ll be well placed to discover Lisbon’s iconic sites from your stylish hotel base. Castelo de Sao Jorge, Alfama and Jerónimos Monastery are all within a 15-minute drive, while Lisbon Zoo and Águas Livres Aqueduct are also closeby. Don’t miss out on a ride aboard the 28E tram, a bucket-list experience for most visitors. The yellow, old-fashioned tram travels from Praça Martim Moniz to Campo de Ourique, skimming the city's famous steep hills.
offer_address: Av. Columbano Bordalo Pinheiro 105, 1099-031 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Historic Lisbon Mansion Stay with River-View Pool
description:
Step into the life of Portuguese nobility at Torel Palace Lisbon, a unique boutique property built across three stunning mansions from the early 1900s. Located on Colina de Santana, in the heart of Lisbon, this beautiful hotel puts you high atop one of Lisbon's seven hills, steps from the city's oldest lift (a welcome option for tired feet) and a short walk from the Portuguese capital's top attractions. The peaceful Jardim do Torel park and bustling Rossio square can be reached within minutes, and the hotel's friendly staff are always on hand to provide maps and recommendations for further exploration.

Torel Palace's river-view pool takes advantage of its hillside position, inviting guests to cool off while enjoying sweeping views across Lisbon's burnt orange rooftops and the Tagus River. Spend evenings in the dimly lit comfort of Terraço 23, a unique spot for signature cocktails, pre-dinner drinks, light tapas bites, salads and burgers. At the end of each day, your boutique hotel room awaits, blending the opulence of the past with modern comforts.
offer_address: R. Câmara Pestana 23, 1150-082 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Five-Star Central Lisbon Escape near Parque Eduardo VII and Marquis of Pombal Square
description: Experience the epitome of romance and five-star elegance at the EPIC SANA Marquês Hotel. This luxury haven is positioned in the heart of Lisbon and is a stone's throw from the city's cultural treasures, including the renowned Marquis of Pombal Square and the verdant Eduardo VII Park. Savour the finest Portuguese cuisine at one of the hotel's three sumptuous restaurants, two bars and bakery, before ascending to the rooftop bar to sip on exquisite cocktails against Lisbon's enchanting skyline.
offer_address: Av. Fontes Pereira de Melo, 8  1069-310 Lisbon, Portugal

title: Heritage Lisbon Art Deco Escape with Daily Breakfast & Museum Pass
description: Allow yourself to be captivated by the magic of Lisbon with a stay at Hotel Britania Art Deco, a Lisbon Heritage Collection - a historic property perfectly positioned for you to explore this little pocket of Portuguese bliss. The hotel proudly retains the glamour of the 1940s courtesy of a spectacular design by Cassiano Branco, a famous Portuguese modernist architect, transporting you back in time, while modern amenities bring you back to the present.
location_description: Hotel Britania Art Deco, a Lisbon Heritage Collection
offer_address: Rua Rodrigues Sampaio, 17, 1150-278 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Heritage Boutique Lisbon Luxury with City-View Rooftop Bar
description:
Discover heritage boutique luxury in Lisbon at H10 Duque de Loulé. Here, the delights of Portugal’s pretty capital are at your fingertips, with unmissable sights such as the Belém Tower, Jerónimos Monastery and Castelo de S. Jorge within a 15-minute drive. Once you’ve finished exploring, return to the hotel’s spectacular rooftop bar, offering sweeping views of the city. 

Housed in an 18th-century building, painstakingly renovated and decorated by interior designer Lázaro Rosa-Violán, this unique hotel exudes heritage charm, complemented by Portuguese and contemporary elements. Relax in bright, airy rooms finished with local tiles - exclusively hand-painted for the hotel - and taste a fusion of Portuguese and Spanish flavours at Azul e Branco restaurant. An intimate boutique atmosphere ensures attentive, personal service and makes it hard not to leave a little piece of your heart in Lisbon.
offer_address: Av. Duque de Loulé 81-83, 1050-088 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Five-Star Lisbon Stay with Old Town & Tagus River Views
description: Five-star comfort meets contemporary design and breathtaking vistas at InterContinental Lisbon, an IHG Hotel. Experience culinary masterpieces at Akla Restaurant, savour Portuguese wine at Uptown Bar or gaze out over the stunning Lisbon skyline from the comfort of a private terrace. Indulge in a spot of shopping at the boutiques on the famous Avenida da Liberdade, admire verdant views of Eduardo VII Park or discover the local area's historic monuments and monasteries.
offer_address: Rua Castilho 149, Lisbon, 1099-034, Portugal

title: Stylish Lisbon Stay in the Heart of the City with Rooftop Bar & Restaurant
description: Be immersed in the exciting nightlife and interesting flavours of Portugal’s famous capital with a retreat to Holiday Inn Lisbon, an IHG Hotel. In the beating heart of the city, take in sweeping views of the sparkling city skyline from the outdoor pool, or with a refreshing drink in hand at the rooftop's Bar Highview. Kick off your day of travels with a buffet breakfast and return to the hotel’s own Mediterranean dining spot, Lounge 28, to sample some delicious traditional Portuguese fare.
location_description: Holiday Inn Lisbon, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Av. Antonio Jose De Almeida 28-A, Lisbon 1000-044, Portugal

title: Five-Star Heritage Palace Escape in the Heart of Lisbon with Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the history and magic of a beautifully restored 16th-century palace at The One Palácio de Anunciada, one of Lisbon’s finest five-star hotels. Nestled in a narrow, cobblestoned street, just one back from the city’s main thoroughfare, Avenida de Liberdade, this luxury lodging is perfectly positioned for exploring the best of the city’s laneways and lookouts. Wander down the Avenida to find the iconic Praça dos Restauradores, before stopping at one of the many cafés or bars in the district for a traditional pastel de nata snack.

You'll find a garden paradise at The One Palácio de Anunciada, with expansive French-style greenery to explore. Spend sunny days by the central fountain and century-old dragon tree in the inner courtyard, or admire the full grounds from your panoramic position in the rooftop swimming pool. Settle in for an afternoon of relaxation at the Despacio Spa, where you’ll find a Finnish sauna, plunge pool and treatments that range from essential oil massages to diamond facials. After a day of exploring Lisbon, engage all your senses at Condes de Ericeira Restaurant or sample the Portuguese wine or curated collection of cocktails at O Jardim Wine Bar, both found in the palace's meticulously restored noble rooms.
location_description: The One Palácio da Anunciada DEC2020
offer_address: Rua das Portas de Santo Antão 112-134, 1150-268, Lisbon, Portugal

title: Lisbon Ocean-View Luxury with a Nine-Hole Golf Course
description: Stay a stone's throw from the Atlantic Ocean at Crowne Plaza Caparica Lisbon, an IHG Hotel, a modern hideaway located along the pristine 26-kilometre stretch of golden shoreline in Costa da Caparica. Spend sunny days basking by the outdoor swimming pool, practice your swing at the nine-hole golf course, or opt to treat yourself to a massage, body wrap or steam bath at the spa. For all-day dining, Raimundo is your go-to for authentic Portuguese cuisine and tasty regional morsels.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Caparica Lisbon, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Largo Aldeia dos Capuchos, Caparica 2825-017, Portugal

vendor_name: The Lumiares Hotel & Spa Lisbon SLH
title: The Lumiares Hotel & Spa LE+ and LPC
description: x
offer_address: R. do Diário de Notícias 142, 1200-146 Lisboa, Portugal

vendor_name: Heritage Avenida Liberdade, a Lisbon Heritage Collection
title: Top-Rated Heritage Escape in the Heart of Lisbon
description:
Let the picture-perfect panorama of Lisbon be the backdrop for an unforgettable stay in one of the city’s most elegant hotels: Heritage Avenida Liberdade Hotel, a Lisbon Heritage Collection. Housed in a heritage-listed building dating back to the 18th century - beautifully redesigned by local designer Miguel Câncio Martins - this charming hotel effortlessly blends Lisbon’s rich history with modern luxury.

A fusion of Portuguese architecture and contemporary design, framed by traditional hand-painted Portuguese tiles, comes together in one of the city’s best addresses: the hotel is ideally located on Avenida da Liberdade - a tree-lined avenue nestled in the heart of the city, surrounded by elegant shops, upscale boutiques and restaurants. This central location makes it easy to explore Lisbon's top-rated attractions, including the medieval Belém Tower, World Heritage-listed Jerónimos Monastery and buzzing Praça do Comércio square.

When you’re not exploring the City of Light, your urban retreat - rated among the top 1% hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor - will be waiting for you with excellent service, an indoor lap pool and elegant rooms.
location_description: Heritage Avenida Liberdade Hotel, a Lisbon Heritage Collection
offer_address: Av. da Liberdade 28, 1250-145 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Boutique Lisbon Heritage Stay on the Praca do Municipio with Restaurant
description: Experience the allure of Lisbon's historic heart at the AlmaLusa Baixa/Chiado, an 18th-century boutique hotel nestled in the city's vibrant cultural district, moments from the thriving city square. Overflowing with understated style and modern comforts, this retreat is your lavish home-away-from-home. Savour Portuguese gastronomy at the hotel's Delfina restaurant, before retreating to your chic, design-led room for a charming city escape.
offer_address: Praça do Município, 21, 1100-365, Lisbon, Portugal

title: Elegant Heritage Escape in the Heart of Lisbon
description:
Framed by a 16th-century façade in the heart of Portugal's vibrant capital, Pousada de Lisboa is a boutique hotel promising urban luxe with historic charm just moments from Lisbon's top attractions. Part of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and ranked in Tripadvisor's top 1% of properties worldwide, this former house for kings and forum for ministries has been beautifully restored into a luxury city launchpad.

This elegant city hotel with first-class features is surrounded by timeless beauty in a prime location opposite the popular Praça do Comércio and Tagus River. Sip a 'bica' along the A Brasileira esplanade, hop between the myriad of bookstores, museums, and irresistible bakeries, or stroll along the south bank to catch panoramic sunset views. Back at the hotel, take time to admire the lavish paintings and intricate sculptures, sink your teeth into a sumptuous steak at the trendy RIB Beef & Wine restaurant serving signature cuts with Portuguese flair, or plunge into the outdoor pool and soak up the Mediterranean sun with a cocktail in hand.
offer_address: Praça do Comércio 31-34, 1100-148 Lisbon Portugal

title: Smart Portuguese City Stay in Lisbon's Business District
description: Experience the wonders of Portugal's postcard-perfect capital when you stay at Holiday Inn Lisbon - Continental, an IHG Hotel. Lisbon’s equally hilly and charming streets and winding alleys will have you eagerly awaiting a cup of coffee and a Portuguese tart at the onsite coffee shop, or perhaps a stronger drop at the hotel's City Bar. For those with energy to spare, the in-house fitness centre awaits.
location_description: Holiday Inn Lisbon - Continental, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Rua Laura Alves 9, Lisbon, 1069-169, Portugal

title: Opulent Lisbon Stay in 13th Century Convent with Iconic Restaurant & Bar
description: Find refined elegance within the walls of a 13th-century Dominican Convent atConvent Square Lisbon, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel. From savoring delectable Portuguese cuisine at Capítulo Restaurant to embracing Portugal's stunning architecture in the emblematic cloister, every moment is an invitation to elevate your senses. Unwind in the sauna or rejuvenate in the heated plunge pool while gazing at Lisbon's breathtaking church top views.
location_description: Convent Square Lisbon, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Rua Dom Antão de Almada 4 1100-373, Lisbon, Portugal

title: MYRIAD by SANA Hotels Preferred LPC
description: x
offer_address: Lote 2.21.01, Parque das Nações, R. Cais das Naus, 1990-173 Lisboa, Portugal

title: Five-Star Lisbon City Break with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Panoramic Spa
description: Let the picture-perfect scenery of the Tagus River be the backdrop for an extraordinary stay in one of Lisbon's top-rated hotels: MYRIAD by SANA Hotels. Experience a stay unlike any other in this otherworldly retreat, featuring bold architecture, contemporary design and unique facilities that redefine the concept of a luxury hotel. Admire the ever-present views over the Tagus River from Michelin-starred restaurant, FIFTY SECONDS Martin Berasategui, or soak away the day at the 23rd-floor tranquil spa and glistening pool. If you can tear yourself away from this urban retreat - rated among the top 1% hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor - the City of Light awaits. Lisbon's top-rated attractions are all within reach by car, including the medieval Belém Tower, World Heritage-listed Jerónimos Monastery and buzzing Praça do Comércio square.
offer_address: Lote 2.21.01, Parque das Nações, R. Cais das Naus, 1990-173 Lisboa, Portugal
